description.en: Decrease Attack by 50%
Decrease Defense by 70%
Decrease Speed by 30%
Decrease Hit Chance by 50%
The target becomes unable to act for a certain number of turns.
The target becomes unable to act for a certain number of turns. Decreases Critical Hit Resistance by 100%, and the effect is dispelled at the moment the target suffers damage from an attack.
Makes the target unable to be healed.
Makes the target unable to be buffed.
The target cannot use skills that require cooldowns.
Target attacks the enemy who provoked them with a basic skill at the start of the turn.
Target attacks the enemy with the highest max Health with a basic skill at the start of the turn.
Receives damage equivalent to 5% of max Health at the start of the turn.
Target receives huge damage proportional to the caster's Attack at the start of the turn.
Target receives damage proportional to the caster's Attack at the start of the turn.
A portion of the damage inflicted on allies except for the target by Single Attacks will also be suffered by the target as additional damage at the end of the turn.
At the end of the debuff duration, the target receives damage proportional to the caster's Attack and becomes unable to move for 1 turn. Debuff duration cannot be extended or decreased.
When attacked, receives additional damage equivalent to 2% of max Health, with a 25% chance to be stunned for 1 turn.
Recovers 10% of the attacker's Health when attacking the target.
Increases damage received by the target by 15%, while decreasing Evasion by 15%.
The target will receive no Combat Readiness increase/decrease effects other than those provided by their Speed stat.
Decreases amount recovered by 50% and reduces the effect of Combat Readiness increases by 50%.
Passive skill effects do not activate. Effective only against Heroes.
At the start of the turn, receives damage equivalent of 10% of max Health and is inflicted with injuries proportional to damage suffered. Venom effect applies to Heroes only.
Decreased Attack, Decrease Hit Chance, Provoke, Silence, Restrict

At the end of the turn, deals additional damage to all allies of the target except for the target equivalent to 10% of their respective max Health. Beguile effect applies to Heroes only, and is dispelled once the effect is activated.
Silence, Decrease Defense, Decrease Speed
Silence, Decrease Defense, Decrease Attack, Unhealable
